title: convert2_maDLC scorer issue

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error. **Describe the bug** After reformatting my config, I run convert2_maDLC and am asked whether I want the first labeled file to be converted. I answer, yes, and I get a key error related to scorer name. Please place code inside this:
Code output

```python KeyError Traceback (most recent call last) in ----> 1 deeplabcut.convert2_maDLC(config_path, userfeedback=True) ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxfun_multianimal.py in convert2_maDLC(config, userfeedback, forceindividual) 181 ) 182 --> 183 if bpt in Data[cfg["scorer"]].keys(): 184 frame = pd.DataFrame( 185 Data[cfg["scorer"]][bpt].values, columns=index, index=imindex ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\frame.py in __getitem__(self, key) 2797 if is_single_key: 2798 if self.columns.nlevels > 1: -> 2799 return self._getitem_multilevel(key) 2800 indexer = self.columns.get_loc(key) 2801 if is_integer(indexer): ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\frame.py in _getitem_multilevel(self, key) 2847 def _getitem_multilevel(self, key): 2848 # self.columns is a MultiIndex -> 2849 loc = self.columns.get_loc(key) 2850 if isinstance(loc, (slice, Series, np.ndarray, Index)): 2851 new_columns = self.columns[loc] ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\indexes\multi.py in get_loc(self, key, method) 2660 if not isinstance(key, (tuple, list)): 2661 # not including list here breaks some indexing, xref #30892 -> 2662 loc = self._get_level_indexer(key, level=0) 2663 return _maybe_to_slice(loc) 2664 ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\indexes\multi.py in _get_level_indexer(self, key, level, indexer) 2927 else: 2928 -> 2929 code = self._get_loc_single_level_index(level_index, key) 2930 2931 if level > 0 or self.lexsort_depth == 0: ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\indexes\multi.py in _get_loc_single_level_index(self, level_index, key) 2596 return -1 2597 else: -> 2598 return level_index.get_loc(key) 2599 2600 def get_loc(self, key, method=None): ~\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\indexes\base.py in get_loc(self, key, method, tolerance) 2646 return self._engine.get_loc(key) 2647 except KeyError: -> 2648 return self._engine.get_loc(self._maybe_cast_indexer(key)) 2649 indexer = self.get_indexer([key], method=method, tolerance=tolerance) 2650 if indexer.ndim > 1 or indexer.size > 1: pandas\_libs\index.pyx in pandas._libs.index.IndexEngine.get_loc() pandas\_libs\index.pyx in pandas._libs.index.IndexEngine.get_loc() pandas\_libs\hashtable_class_helper.pxi in pandas._libs.hashtable.PyObjectHashTable.get_item() pandas\_libs\hashtable_class_helper.pxi in pandas._libs.hashtable.PyObjectHashTable.get_item() KeyError: 'luke' ``` ```python deeplabcut.convert2_maDLC(config_path, userfeedback=True) ```

Here is my config: [configtxt.txt](https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/files/4678157/configtxt.txt) **Desktop (please complete the following information about your system):** - OS: [e.g. Windows10 - DeepLabCut Version 2.2b5
